NTP_SERVER_TEST.desc: LOAD NTP SERVER TABLE WITH ADDRESS WITH IPV4, IPV6 AND HOST NAME AS NTP SERVERS.

NTP_SERVER_1_NEG_TEST.desc: LOAD NTP SERVER TABLE WITH EMPTY ADDRESS AS NTP SERVER.

NTP_SERVER_2_NEG_TEST.desc: LOAD NTP SERVER TABLE WITH INVALID IP ADDRESS AS NTP SERVER.

NTP_SERVER_3_NEG_TEST.desc: LOAD NTP SERVER TABLE WITH INVALID HOST NAME AS NTP SERVER.

NTP_MGMT_VRF_INVALID_MGMT_VRF_STATE_TEST.desc: CONFIGURE NTP IN MGMT VRF WITH MGMT VRF DISABLED SHOULD BE REJECTED.

NTP_MGMT_VRF_WITH_NOEXIST_MGMT_VRF_TEST.desc: CONFIGURE NTP IN MGMT VRF WITHOUT MGMT VRF CONFIGURED SHOULD BE REJECTED.

NTP_SRC_INTF.desc: CONFIGURE MULTIPLE INTERFACES AS NTP SOURCE INTERFACE.

NTP_SRC_INTF_WITH_NONEXIST_ETH_PORT.desc: CONFIGURE NON-EXISTING ETHERNET INTERFACE AS NTP SOURCE INTERFACE.

NTP_SRC_INTF_WITH_NONEXIST_LOOPBACK_INTF.desc: CONFIGURE NON-EXISTING LOOPBACK INTERFACE AS NTP SOURCE INTERFACE.

NTP_SRC_INTF_WITH_NONEXIST_PORTCHANNEL_I.desc: CONFIGURE NON-EXISTING PORTCHANNEL INTERFACE AS NTP SOURCE INTERFACE.

NTP_SRC_INTF_WITH_NONEXIST_MGMT_INTF.desc: CONFIGURE NON-EXISTING MGMT INTERFACE AS NTP SOURCE INTERFACE.
